html:
Feb 17 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - FY 2022 Q3 TRADING STATEMENT AND BOARD UPDATE *AVEVA - AVEVA INCREASED ANNUALISED RECURRING REVENUE (ARR)((2) ) BY 9.6% YEAR-ON-YEAR IN 12 MONTHS TO 31 DECEMBER 2021 *AVEVA - AVEVA INTENDS TO ACCELERATE ARR GROWTH DURING NEXT FINANCIAL YEAR *AVEVA - SALES PIPELINE FOR REMAINDER OF FINANCIAL YEAR IS SOLID *AVEVA - REVENUE OUTLOOK FOR FULL YEAR THAT IS IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS *AVEVA - DIRECTORS HAVE REQUESTED THAT PHILIP AIKEN REMAINS AS CHAIRMAN FOR A FURTHER YEAR BEYOND AVEVA'S 2022 AGM *AVEVA - IN ADDITION, FROM 1 MARCH 2022, JAMES KIDD, AVEVA'S DEPUTY CEO AND CFO, WILL BECOME AVEVA'S CHIEF STRATEGY AND TRANSFORMATION OFFICER. *AVEVA - KIDD WILL REMAIN ON BOARD AS ONE OF TWO EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS *AVEVA - REVENUE DECLINED BY A LOW SINGLE DIGIT RATE YEAR-ON-YEAR IN Q3 FY 2022 ON A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 17-FEB-202207:00:07 GMT
